alert.note: Alert for Sandusky; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 9:00PM EST until March 05 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Portage River At Woodville affecting Sandusky and Wood Counties. For the Portage River, including Woodville, minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Portage River At Woodville. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, The river inundates lower portions of Trail Marker Park and is out of its banks in Pemberville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EST Friday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 9.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 700 AM EST.
